mapper.select: select count(*) from dt_brand where name=#{0}

select * from dt_brand dt1, ( select top 20 id from ( select top ((#{index})*20) id from dt_brand
where 1=1
and brand_type=#{brand_type}
and name like '%'+#{name}+'%'
order by id desc ) dt order by dt.id asc ) dt2 where dt1.id=dt2.id order by dt1.id desc
